translation.text:
Flow-on delays are occurring to services in both directions due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. 
- Larger than normal service gaps may be experienced and as a result, services may run out of timetabled order. 
- Your normal service may depart from a different platform than usual and may have altered stops.
Please continue to allow additional travel time, listen to announcements and check station information screens for service updates.
Inner West & Leppington Line, Western Line - Delays

Delays are continuing due a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. There may be larger than normal gaps between some services. Some stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.

Please continue to allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements and check information screens.

Flow-on delays are occurring to services in both directions due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. 
- Larger than normal service gaps may be experienced and as a result, services may run out of timetabled order. 
- Your normal service may depart from a different platform than usual and may have altered stops.
Please continue to allow additional travel time, listen to announcements and check station information screens for service updates.

If you are travelling from Museum, St James, Circular Quay, Wynyard or Town Hall to stations on the Richmond Line and have limited mobility, please board a T1 Western Line service heading towards Penrith/Emu Plains and change at Seven Hills. If you are at Central you can board a direct service to Richmond from platforms 1-12.

Blacktown Delays are continuing, due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. There may be a larger-than-usual gap between services.

Please continue to allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps, as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.

Please change at Campbelltown to complete your journey.

Due to an operational issue, the rear four cars of this service are unavailable. Please move evenly along the platform, and utilise other carriages.

The lift between the concourse and platforms 1 & 2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9848 9388.
The lift between the concourse and the bus interchange is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9625 8156.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 & 2 is temporarily out of service. For any assistance, please ask staff or call 6354 9507.
Station Update - Bankstown, Bardwell Park, Belmore and more

Larger than normal service gaps may be experienced and services may operate out of timetabled order due to a fatality at Lidcombe earlier. 

Please allow plenty of additional travel time, listen to announcements and check station information screens before joining your service.

There are changes happening at Central Station during Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may be limited, which means using different stairs, escalators and lifts. 

Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. 

For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform.

There are changes at Sydenham station during Sydney Metro construction.

T3 Bankstown Line services to the City are available from platform 3 and to Lidcombe and Liverpool from platform 4.

A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5.

If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
